description: Lists all component types in a workspace.

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: A list of objects that filter the request. (dict) --- An object that filters items in a list of component types. extendsFrom (string) --- The component type that the component types in the list extend. namespace (string) --- The namespace to which the component types in the list belong. isAbstract (boolean) --- A Boolean value that specifies whether the component types in the list are abstract.

nested_params.name: extendsFrom
nested_params.description: The component type that the component types in the list extend.

nested_params.name: namespace
nested_params.description: The namespace to which the component types in the list belong.

nested_params.name: isAbstract
nested_params.description: A Boolean value that specifies whether the component types in the list are abstract.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return at one time. The default is 25. Valid Range: Minimum value of 1. Maximum value of 250.

nested_items.name: componentTypeSummaries
nested_items.description: A list of objects that contain information about the component types.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the component type.

nested_items.name: componentTypeId
nested_items.description: The ID of the component type.

nested_items.name: creationDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time when the component type was created.

nested_items.name: updateDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time when the component type was last updated.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the component type.

nested_items.name: state
nested_items.description: The current state of the entity, component, component type, or workspace.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The string that specifies the next page of results.

nested_items.name: maxResults
nested_items.description: Specifies the maximum number of results to display.
